attributes.action: Limit the access to data collected under the Regulation of Investigatory Powers Act (RIPA)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The RIPA suffers abuse from local councils and similar bodies who use their access to the data for trivial matters such as over-stuffed rubbish bins, dog fouling and the policing of school catchment areas. This abuse of power is unacceptable and not in keeping with the spirit of the legislation (supposedly introduced as an anti-terrorist measure). The undersigned accept that the gathering of data is useful in the fight against terrorism and organised crime and would like to see its use restricted to these purposes only.
